##### **The City of George West is committed to sound financial planning as set forth in the budget and financial policies. The principal goal of the City is to maintain a satisfactory and efficient level of service that our customers and citizens expect at an affordable cost.**

##### **The Finance Department is responsible for providing financial information including accounting, auditing, cash / debt management services, budget preparation, investments, purchasing, payroll processing, inventory management and the administration of all other financial affairs of the City.**

[Contact](https://cityofgw.org/contact/)
